title: Arcaea pack metadata
description: The metadata of packs in Arcaea

id.description: The id of the pack, used in the songlist file

section.description: The section of the pack, used in pack selection view. The value used in this fields changed after 6.3.2

pack_parent.description: The id of the parent pack of this pack

is_extend_pack.description: Is this a world extend pack

is_active_extend_pack.description: Is this world extend pack currently active one (and is not extend archive pack)

small_pack_image.description: Is this pack use a smaller cover image (like memory archive)

cutout_pack_image.description: Is this pack use a partially transparent cover image (so that the white background behind the cover image should be not shown)

cost.description: The price of this pack in memories, however from 3.0.0 this will be controlled by server instead of keep in packlist

custom_banner.description: Is a custom banner included in the cover image of the pack. If no, a banner will be automatically generated for this pack

plus_character.description: The id of the associated partner of the pack, -1 if there are none associated partner

name_localized.description: The name of the pack, localized in various languages

description_localized.description: The description of the pack used when the pack is not yet purchased, localized in various languages
